code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import axios from"axios";const initialState={data:null,loading:false,error:null};export const fetchTopMovie=createAsyncThunk('movie/fetchTopMovie',async()=>{const response=await axios.get('https://cinemaguide.skillbox.cc/movie/top10');return response.data;});const topMovieSlice=createSlice({name:'topMovie',initialState,reducers:{},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(fetchTopMovie.pending,state=>{state.loading=true;state.error=null;}).addCase(fetchTopMovie.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.data=action.payload;}).addCase(fetchTopMovie.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.error=action.error.message||'Failed to load movie';});}});export default topMovieSlice.reducer;
